name: Lightform
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You transform your body into pure light. Weapon attacks deal no damage to you under any circumstances, and you absorb fire and radiant damage.

While in this form, your Radiant spells deal +2 damage per damage die rolled, and you can move to any point struck by one of your Radiant spells as part of that spell.

At the start of each of your turns, you lose 15 MP. If you can't pay that cost, the spell ends.
